commit.message:
expr.c (expr_add_location): Move declaration to before all statements.

	* expr.c (expr_add_location): Move declaration to before all
	statements.
	* parse.y (java_expand_classes): Ditto.
	* lex.c (java_peek_unicode): Ditto.

From-SVN: r89152
